label.intro:
Course Objectives

 

By the end of this course, participants will be able to

  • Identify steps of the lesson plan cycle, with emphasis on backward design;
  • Use the TEAL Online Lesson Planner to create lesson plans.

Expectations for the course:

You are expected to read and post at least once in each forum (not each discussion thread) and journal; watch recorded presentations; read the background readings and resource pages of the course; and complete assignments and the final evaluation.

To guide you in the design of differentiated instruction for your students, use the Standards for Mathematical Practice found in College and Career Readiness Standards for Adult Education.  These standards represent processes and proficiencies that students at any NRS level should use and develop as they learn.
